biography:
Rob Hardy is a film producer, writer, television and film director. His films include The Gospel, Trois, and Trois 2: Pandora's Box. He wrote his first film, Chocolate City while a student at Florida A&M University. His television credits include ER, Criminal Minds, The Vampire Diaries and 90210.

Hardy is a member of Alpha Phi Alpha, the first intercollegiate Greek-letter fraternity established for African Americans. He is currently in talks to write the Untitled New Edition Biopic.
name: Rob Hardy
